Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2016 11:44PM Dressage49 wrote: I have been just diagnosed, too! I am so grateful to have someone to talk to about this. Once I have my results and decide what surgery I will have, I will feel better, I think! It's making the decision that's taking all my energy! I wish everyone on this discussion board the absolute best results
